error.message: Call to deprecated method strtolower() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strtolower() instead.

Parameter $entity_query of method Drupal\search_api_best_bets\Plugin\search_api\processor\BestBetsProcessor::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Call to deprecated method strtolower() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strtolower() instead.

Interface Drupal\search_api_best_bets\QueryHandler\QueryHandlerPluginInterface extends deprecated interface Drupal\Component\Plugin\ConfigurablePluginInterface: Drupal\Component\Plugin\ConfigurablePluginInterface is deprecated in Drupal 8.7.0 and will be removed before Drupal 9.0.0. You should implement ConfigurableInterface and/or DependentPluginInterface directly as needed. If you implement ConfigurableInterface you may choose to implement ConfigurablePluginInterface in Drupal 8 as well for maximum compatibility, however this must be removed prior to Drupal 9.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to search_api_best_bets.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
